text: No Mercy (2001) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on October 21, 2001 at the Savvis Center in St. Louis, Missouri. It was the fourth No Mercy event held by the WWF. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 The Acolytes Protection Agency (Faarooq and Bradshaw) defeated Chris Kanyon and Hugh Morrus Tag team match 5:20 2 Billy Kidman (c) defeated Scotty 2 Hotty Singles match for the WCW Cruiserweight Championship 7:53 3 The Hardy Boyz (Matt and Jeff Hardy) (c) (with Lita) defeated Lance Storm and The Hurricane (with Mighty Molly and Ivory) Tag team match for the WCW Tag Team Championship 7:42 4 Test defeated Kane Singles match 10:09 5 Torrie Wilson defeated Stacy Keibler Lingerie match 3:09 6 Edge defeated Christian (c) Ladder match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 22:16 7 The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley) (c) defeated Big Show and Tajiri Tag team match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 9:19 8 The Undertaker defeated Booker T Singles match 13:12 9 Chris Jericho defeated The Rock (c) Singles match for the WCW Championship 23:44 10 Stone Cold Steve Austin (c) defeated Kurt Angle and Rob Van Dam Triple Threat match for the WWF Championship 15:15 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official No Mercy 2001 website Category:2001 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in St. Louis, Missouri Category:WWE No Mercy Category:2001 in American television Category:2000s in Missouri Category:History of St. Louis, Missouri
title: No Mercy (2001)
